org.smooks.engine.resource.config.xpath

Class DefaultSelectorStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smooks.engine.resource.config.xpath.DefaultSelectorStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SelectorStep

    public class DefaultSelectorStep
extends Object
implements SelectorStep
    XPath Expression Evaluator.

    Implementations evaluate a single step in an XPath expression.

    Author:
    tom.fennelly@jboss.com

      • DefaultSelectorStep

                           org.jaxen.expr.Step step)
                    throws org.jaxen.saxpath.SAXPathException
        Public constructor.
        Parameters:
        xpathExpression - The XPath expression of which the Step is a part.
        step - The XPath Step.
        Throws:

      • DefaultSelectorStep

        public DefaultSelectorStep(String xpathExpression,
                           org.jaxen.expr.Step step,
                           org.jaxen.expr.Step attributeStep)
                    throws org.jaxen.saxpath.SAXPathException
        Public constructor.

        Allows asssociation of an attribute step. XPath expressions can have the form "xxx/@abc", where the attribute "abc" is on the element "xxx".

        Parameters:
        xpathExpression - The XPath expression of which the Step is a part.
        step - The XPath Step.
        attributeStep - The Attribute Step.
        Throws:
        org.jaxen.saxpath.SAXPathException - Error constructing the selector step.

                           String targetElementName)
        Public constructor.
        Parameters:
        xpathExpression - The XPath expression of which the Step is a part.
        targetElementName - The target element name associated with this selector step.

        Public constructor.
        Parameters:

        elementName - The target element name associated with this selector step.
        attributeName - The target attribute name associated with this selector step.

      • isTargetedAtNamespace

        public boolean isTargetedAtNamespace(String namespace)
        Is this StepSelector instance targeted at the specified namespace.

        If the StepSelector namespace is null, it automatically matches and no comparison is made against the supplied namespace.

        Specified by:
        isTargetedAtNamespace in interface SelectorStep
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace to be tested.
        Returns:
        True if the target namespace matches (or is null), otherwise false.

      • accessesText

        public boolean accessesText()
        Does this step require access to the element text content.

        Does this step include a 'text()' predicate at any level.

        Specified by:
        accessesText in interface SelectorStep
        Returns:
        True if the step requires access to the element's text content, otherwise false.
